welcome_message_body: Welcome to West Lincoln, Canada! Get ready to experience the charm of our small, picturesque town known for its beautiful nature trails and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that West Lincoln has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at John C. Munroe Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at John C. Munroe Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Catharines Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Catharines Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after accepting the terms and conditions.
